00020 NeuralNetBatch::NeuralNetBatch(int ins, int outs) : NeuralNet(ins, outs) {

00035 NeuralNetBatch::NeuralNetBatch(Vector& dims, Vector& squash) : NeuralNet(dims, squash) {
00036 
00037     grads = new Matrix[layers+1];
00038 
00039     for (int l=0; l < layers; l++) {
00040         grads[l].resize((int)dims[l], (int)dims[l+1]);

00046 void NeuralNetBatch::batchStep() {
00047     
00048     for (int l=0; l < layers; l++) {
00049         noalias(layerParams[l]) += stepSize*grads[l];
00050     }
00051 }

00055 void NeuralNetBatch::computeDirection(int steps) {
00056     
00057     for (int l=0; l < layers; l++) {
00058         grads[l]/=steps;
00059     }
00060 }
00061 
00062     
00063 void NeuralNetBatch::accumulateGrad(double reward, Observation& newObs) {
00064     for (int l=0; l < layers; l++) {
00065         noalias(grads[l]) += reward*layerTraces[l];
00066     }
00067 }

00070 void NeuralNetBatch::resetGrad() {
00071     for (int l=0; l < layers; l++) {
00072         grads[l].clear();
00073     }
00074 }

00080 void NeuralNetBatch::reduce(Vector& v, StatsEnum s) {
00081 
00082     assert(v.size() >= (size_t)parameters);
00083 
00084     int p = 0;
00085 
00086     if (s == Approximator::GRADS) {
00087         // Doing grads
00088         for (int l=0; l < layers; l++) {
00089             UBlasExtras::addMatrixToVector(grads[l], v, p);
00090             p += layerParams[l].size1()*layerParams[l].size2();
00091         }    
00092         assert(p == parameters);
00093     }
00094     // Neural net knows how to do other types
00095     else NeuralNet::reduce(v, s);
00096 
00097 }
00098 
00099 
00100 void NeuralNetBatch::scatter(Vector& v, StatsEnum s) {
00101 
00102     assert(v.size()==(size_t)parameters);
00103 
00104     int p = 0;
00105 
00106     if (s==Approximator::GRADS) {
00107         for (int l=0; l < layers; l++) {
00108             grads[l].clear();
00109             UBlasExtras::addScaledVectorToMatrix(1.0, v, grads[l], p);
00110             p += layerParams[l].size1()*layerParams[l].size2();
00111         }    
00112         assert(p == parameters);
00113     }
00114     else NeuralNet::scatter(v, s);
00115 
00116 }
